title: CBP Journalist Watchlist and Border Surveillance Program Documented
summary: Customs and Border Protection maintains secret database monitoring journalists movements and creates watchlist of "Suspected Organizers, Coordinators, Instigators and Media" including 10 journalists with detailed dossiers. Program enables systematic secondary screening at borders, electronic device searches, and movement tracking of press covering immigration and national security, demonstrating coordinated surveillance infrastructure.

sources.title: How Trump's first administration threatened press freedom at the border
